body_html: I have installed every toolbox I could find, both VS and build tools, rebooted :), and am still getting the same behavior. After doing that, a third file called Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props has appeared under C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\BuildTools\Common7\IDE\VC\VCTargets, and setting the VCTargetsPath to that gives exactly the same behavior.
body_text: I have installed every toolbox I could find, both VS and build tools, rebooted :), and am still getting the same behavior. After doing that, a third file called Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props has appeared under C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\BuildTools\Common7\IDE\VC\VCTargets, and setting the VCTargetsPath to that gives exactly the same behavior.
body:
I have installed every toolbox I could find, both VS and build tools, rebooted :), and am still getting the same behavior. After doing that, a third file called Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props has appeared under C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\BuildTools\Common7\IDE\VC\VCTargets, and setting the VCTargetsPath to that gives exactly the same behavior.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22304254/43209547-cf8590ee-9024-11e8-9cef-bf280d3769e9.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22304254/43209601-f6d7f754-9024-11e8-8c7c-abb1783fa771.png)
